subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Knights, who outscored the Terrapins by 24-0 in the second half, have won three in a row since a season-opening loss to Cincinnati.
snippet: The Scarlet Knights, who outscored the Terrapins by 24-0 in the second half, have won three in a row since a season-opening loss to Cincinnati.
